A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This didn't even really feel like a Star Wars movie. I'm all for doing new things\, but it still needs to feel like it belongs. There were a few things I liked\, but I can count those on one hand and that is something I never wanted to have to say about a Star Wars movie. The pacing is off\, the subplots are uninteresting\, the 'new' force powers are jarring and the whole thing just ends up feeling like poor fanfiction.
